grade: Jōyō kanji, taught in junior high
on reading compounds: 焼却【ショウキャク】incineration, destroy by fire
償却【ショウキャク】repayment, redemption, depreciation, amortization, amortisation
kun reading compounds: 却って【かえって】on the contrary, rather, all the more, instead
退ける【しりぞける】to repel, to drive away, to repulse, to reject
